put.description: Create or replace (overwrite/recreate, with potential downtime) a Test Base in the specified subscription.

parameters.name: parameters
parameters.description: Parameters supplied to create a Test Base.

200.description: The Test Base was successfully created or updated.

201.description: The Test Base 'create' or 'update' operation was successfully enqueued. Check provisioningState to see detailed status.

ProxyResource.description: The resource model definition for an ARM proxy resource. It will have everything other than required location and tags

TrackedResource.description: The resource model definition for an ARM tracked top level resource

location.description: The geo-location where the resource lives

ErrorResponse.description: The error response send when an operation fails.

TestBaseSKUListResult.description: A list of Test Base SKUs.

value.description: The list of Test Base SKUs.

nextLink.description: Link to the next set of results. Not empty if value contains incomplete list of results.

TestBaseSKU.description: Properties of the Test Base SKU.

name.description: The name of the SKU. This is typically a letter + number code, such as A0 or P3.

tier.description: The tier of this particular SKU.

TestBaseSKUCapability.description: Properties of the Test Base SKU Capability.

name.description: An invariant to describe the feature, such as 'SLA'.

value.description: An invariant if the feature is measured by quantity, such as 99.9%.

SystemData.description: Metadata pertaining to creation and last modification of the resource.

createdBy.description: The identity that created the resource.

createdByType.description: The type of identity that created the resource.

lastModifiedBy.description: The identity that last modified the resource.

lastModifiedByType.description: The type of identity that last modified the resource.

lastModifiedAt.description: The type of identity that last modified the resource.

nextLink.description: Link to the next set of results. Not empty if value contains incomplete list of results.

systemData.description: The system metadata relating to this resource

TestBaseResourceProperties.description: The properties of a Test Base resource.

provisioningState.description: The provisioning state of the resource.

sku.description: The SKU of the Test Base.

testBaseStatus.description: The status of the Test Base.

TestBaseUpdateParameters.description: Parameters supplied to update a Test Base.

tags.description: The tags of the Test Base.

TestBaseUpdateParameterProperties.description: Parameters supplied to update a Test Base.

sku.description: The SKU of the Test Base.

TestBaseUsageDataList.description: A list of Test Base usage data.

value.description: The list of Test Base usage data.

nextLink.description: Link to the next set of results. Not empty if value contains incomplete list of results.

TestBaseUsageData.description: The usage data of a Test Base.

name.description: Localizable String object containing the name and a localized value.

unit.description: Representing the units of the usage quota. Possible values are: Count, Bytes, Seconds, Percent, CountPerSecond, BytesPerSecond.

limit.description: The maximum permitted value for the usage quota. If there is no limit, this value will be -1.

currentValue.description: Current value for the usage quota.

TestBaseUsageName.description: Localizable String object containing the name and a localized value.

GetFileUploadURLParameters.description: The parameters supplied to the Test Base GetFileUploadURL action.

blobName.description: The custom file name of the uploaded blob.

uploadUrl.description: The URL used for uploading the package.

blobPath.description: The blob path of the uploaded package. It will be used as the 'blobPath' property of PackageResource.

nextLink.description: Link to the next set of results. Not empty if value contains incomplete list of results.

systemData.description: The system metadata relating to this resource

actualOSName.description: The actual name of an Available OS of a Test Base.

nextLink.description: Link to the next set of results. Not empty if value contains incomplete list of results.

systemData.description: The system metadata relating to this resource

actualFlightingRingName.description: The actual name of a flighting ring of a Test Base.

nextLink.description: Link to the next set of results. Not empty if value contains incomplete list of results.

systemData.description: The system metadata relating to this resource

actualTestTypeName.description: The actual name of a test type of a Test Base.

PackageCheckNameAvailabilityParameters.description: Parameters body to pass for Test Base package name availability check.

type.description: fully qualified resource type which includes provider namespace.

nameAvailable.description: Value indicating the availability of the name: true if the name is available; otherwise, false.

reason.description: The reason for unavailability of a name. Required if nameAvailable == false.

message.description: The detailed info regarding the reason associated with the name. Required if nameAvailable == false.

CheckNameAvailabilityResult.description: Description of a Check Name availability response properties.

PackageListResult.description: A list of Test Base packages.

value.description: The list of Test Base packages.

nextLink.description: Link to the next set of results. Not empty if value contains incomplete list of results.

systemData.description: The system metadata relating to this resource

PackageProperties.description: The properties of the Test Base package.

provisioningState.description: The provisioning state of the resource.

testTypes.description: OOB, functional or both. OOB must be selected

targetOSList.description: Specifies the target OSs of specific OS Update types.

lastModifiedTime.description: The UTC timestamp when the package was last modified.

flightingRing.description: The flighting ring for feature update.

isEnabled.description: Specifies whether the package is enabled. It doesn't schedule test for package which is not enabled.

blobPath.description: The file path of the package.

validationResults.description: The validation results. There's validation on package when it's created or updated.

TargetOSInfo.description: The information of the target OS to be tested.

osUpdateType.description: Specifies the OS update type to test against, e.g., 'Security updates' or 'Feature updates'.

targetOSs.description: Specifies the target OSs to be tested.

PackageValidationResult.description: The validation results. There's validation on package when it's created or updated.

isValid.description: Indicates whether the package passed the validation.

validationRunStatus.description: The status of the validation run of the package.

isActive.description: Indicates if this test is active.It doesn't schedule test for not active Test.

commands.description: The commands used in the test.

Command.description: The command used in the test

content.description: The content of the command. The content depends on source type.

runElevated.description: Specifies whether to run the command as administrator.

restartAfter.description: Specifies whether to restart the VM after the command executed.

maxRunTime.description: Specifies the max run time of the command.

runAsInteractive.description: Specifies whether to run the command in interactive mode.

alwaysRun.description: Specifies whether to run the command even if a previous command is failed.

applyUpdateBefore.description: Specifies whether to apply update before the command.

PackageUpdateParameters.description: Parameters supplied to update a Test Base package.

PackageUpdateParameterProperties.description: Parameters supplied to update a Test Base package.

testTypes.description: OOB, functional or both. OOB must be selected

targetOSList.description: Specifies the target OSs of specific OS Update types.

flightingRing.description: The flighting ring for feature update.

isEnabled.description: Specifies whether the package is enabled. It doesn't schedule test for package which is not enabled.

blobPath.description: The file name of the package.

DownloadURLResponse.description: The response of getting a download URL.

expirationTime.description: Expiry date of the download URL.

nextLink.description: Link to the next set of results. Not empty if value contains incomplete list of results.

systemData.description: The system metadata relating to this resource

testSummaryId.description: The Id of the current Test Summary.

packageId.description: The Azure resource Id of package.

executionStatus.description: The execution status of last test.

testRunTime.description: The run time of the last test.

featureUpdatesTestSummary.description: The result summary of tests triggered by feature updates

securityUpdatesTestSummary.description: The result summary of tests triggered by security updates

TestExecutionStatus.description: The execution status of a test.

executionStatus.description: The status of the last test.

testRunTime.description: The run time of the last test.

osUpdateTestSummaries.description: Detailed summary for each OS update

osName.description: The operating system name. e.g. Windows 10 1809.

releaseName.description: The name of the tested release (OS update).

buildVersion.description: The build version of the tested release (OS update)

buildRevision.description: The build revision of the tested release (OS update)

flightingRing.description: The flighting ring, only for release of feature updates.

executionStatus.description: The execution status of the test.

testRunTime.description: The run time of the test.
